Each event/function is made up of individual steps.  When\nSlay Q executes a function it caches the output of each step so that if one should fail, and the function is retried, the steps\nbefore the failure don't need to be re-run."}]},{"type":"element","tag":"p","props":{},"children":[{"type":"text","value":"To create a function, simply call the
